header.title: 3D Printing Santiago
header.subtitle: We are a Belgian-Chilean company specialized in 3D printing

design_introduction.text: You have an idea or a project? But you don't know how to make your design in 3D? We design it for you! Afterwards you can print it or use it for other uses.

design_how.title: How do we design?
design_how.scratch_text: Tell us your project by mail, by phone or visit us. Based on your instructions we make the design.
design_how.logo_text: We can also make a 3D design from a 2D image. It can be a logo, an image or a text. Do not hesitate to contact us and tell us about your project.

printing_intro.text: We are experts in Fusel Model Deposition 3D printing. This technology allows us to reconstruct any geometric form, layer by layer, starting from a 3D model.

printing_limitations.title: What can be printed?
printing_limitations.intro: Were are specialized in 3D printing using Fused Model Deposition (FDM). Here you have a summary of what can and what cannot be done.
printing_limitations.materials_text: We mostly use plastic PLA which is made up from plants (biodegradable) and also generates very fine prints. ABS, which is a more traditional plastic, it is used when one requires pieces with greater mechanical resistance or resistance to temperature. If your project needs something more special, we also have a great variety of other materials: imitation wood, imitation metal, flexible material etc.
printing_limitations.color_text: PLA and ABS are available in a wide variety of colors: white, black, red, orange, yellow, green, blue, violet, brown.
printing_limitations.size_text: Our printers can print up to 25 x 21 x 20 cm. For bigger things, it can be done in separate parts.
printing_limitations.price_text: The price is calculated from the 3D model. We use a program that estimates the weight the piece will have and we charge per gram. The larger the piece, the more it will weigh and the greater its cost.

printing_tutorial.title: Tutorial
printing_tutorial.intro: 3D Printing with us is very easy and can be done in 3 steps
printing_tutorial.file_text: The file can be from STL or OBJ format. You can get it from any 3D design program. You Don´t know how to design in 3D or don´t have time? We offer 3D design services. You can also find many designs on the Internet. The site Thingiverse for example already has millions of designs that can be downloaded for free.
printing_tutorial.quote_text: Send us the design by mail and we will reply you soon with a quote. Here are our contact details
printing_tutorial.delivery_text: You can get your piece by coming to our office or we also offer delivery option. The price depends on the shipping region.

our_projects.title: Mini Entel Towers
our_projects.text: We designed and 3D printed the Entel Towers of Melon's marketing campaign on the social networks.

our_projects.title: Pendrives
our_projects.text: We designed and 3D printed these special USB keys with it's special bottle like shape. For the Distonia Fundation.

our_projects.title: Tyrion Lanister
our_projects.text: Reward for the Nerd Night's tomobla organized by the House of Goethe

our_projects.title: Llaveros
our_projects.text: Solcor delivers his brand image with these key chains.

our_projects.title: Husky
our_projects.text: The Husky robot of the Universidad de Chile uses R3D's printed parts in order to mount its sensors.

footer.description: 3D Printing services and development of engineering projects.
